comments_since_last_sample.body: I just like calling them Ticklesac
Listen to “Rock Star” and it’ll make more sense

Yes... It was definitely more of a trendy meme thing for sure and it just kind became the popular thing to hate on them since then. There are many bands of the last 20 years I'd prefer to not listen to before Nickelback... One of them being Coldplay... Zzzzzzzzz... And many others... Nickelback really isn't bad and they do have some good songs as well.
I read an article on this topic years ago. The consensus based on a survey thousands was that they were trying too hard to be a metal band and not just be what they were.
It’s pretty bad. So is most mainstream rock from the same era. They just happened to be one of the most successful so they so they got most of the hate

Their formulaic music is the result of careful analysis and copying.  All pop songwriters do it to some extent but a “rock band” shouldn’t do it (and certainly shouldn’t admit to doing it, as Nickleback has).

perhaps they like it in about thirty years

people really (really) hated Rick Astley back in the day. It was a good thing social media didn't exist at that time.
A few weeks ago I was sure that Nickleback was playing a live show in the park across from my house. When I looked out the window I realized I was just hearing the city mowing the grass in the park.
I don’t get it either, I love their music.
I like them 🤷‍♀️ Course I use my own mind to think.
I feel like these days it’s just because the meme really kicked off all that time ago
Well, aside from their music being generic cookie cutter stuff, Chad Kroeger is a bit of a dick.
